## linkGraphicsComponents() function

Shares compatible buffers between components, so updates to one affect all.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function linkGraphicsComponents(graphicsComponents: readonly ILinkableGraphicsComponent<TUnknownComponentRenderer, unknown, unknown>[]): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  graphicsComponents | readonly [ILinkableGraphicsComponent](./core.ilinkablegraphicscomponent.md)<!-- -->&lt;[TUnknownComponentRenderer](./core.tunknowncomponentrenderer.md)<!-- -->, unknown, unknown&gt;\[\] |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
